name: Clayton
description: Meet Clayton: your fluffy, blue companion in the TON ecosystem. Clayton is focused on spreading good vibes and growing the community. Having just surpassed 10 million players, Clayton engages his fans through mini-games and a mascot culture similar to Ponke, Mew, and Brett. Since launch, Clayton has been focused on: ▪️ Building a community-driven project to bring new users to TON ▪️ Collaborating with meme tokens from other networks for cross-platform engagement ▪️ Launching new mini-games
